alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing bond between a carbon atom and a lead atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organolead compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic salts containing a lead ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic lead salts

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organometallic compounds with the generic formula R-M-X, where R is an alkyl group, and X is a metal atom.
class.name: Metal alkyl halides

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as metal alkyl halides. These are organometallic compounds with the generic formula R-M-X, where R is an alkyl group, and X is a metal atom.

direct_parent.description: Organometallic compounds with the generic formula R-M-X, where R is an alkyl group, and X is a metal atom.
direct_parent.name: Metal alkyl halides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and metal atom.
superclass.name: Organometallic compounds
